org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract.rawlocal

Class RawlocalFSContract

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract.AbstractFSContract
        • org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract.localfs.LocalFSContract
          • org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract.rawlocal.RawlocalFSContract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable

    public class RawlocalFSContract
extends LocalFSContract
    Raw local filesystem. This is the inner OS-layer FS before checksumming is added around it.
